author: William Hague
title: Greece does not mark the end of the euro debacle, merely the beginning
text: Greece Greece does not mark the end of the euro debacle, merely the beginning I remember being regarded as eccentric for doubting the euro project. Now it has proved a monumental error of judgement, analysis and leadership By William Hague
